handleChangeToWinnerDisplay(ActionEvent) - Method in class ZuulBad.Game

handleClickDestroy(ActionEvent) - Method in class ZuulBad.Game
By click on the backpack's button 'destroy' the string in the textfield is analysed and if there is an item with that name it is removed from backpack.
handleClickDrop(ActionEvent) - Method in class ZuulBad.Game
By click on the backpack's button 'drop' the string in the textfield is analysed and if there is an item with that name it is dropped and removed from backpack.
handleClickEat(ActionEvent) - Method in class ZuulBad.Game
By click on the backpack's button 'eat' the string in the textfield is analysed and if there is a food item with that name it is eaten and removed from backpack.
